alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 2:51PM MST until January 25 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches, with locally higher totals in the Tushar Mountains and Brian Head area. * WHERE...Central Mountains and Southern Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on potential winter driving conditions, particularly along higher mountain routes and passes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Peak snowfall rates, ranging from 0.5-1 inch per hour, will be from roughly 5 AM Thursday through the morning. Expect winter driving conditions through the day.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
